```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
x  <- read_csv("data/i_names.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
x <- babyname |> 
  select(year, names, sex, prop) |> 
  count(name(n = )) |>  
  mutate(prop = prop * 1000000) |> 
  summarize(sum_prop = sum(prop), .by = c(year, sex)) |>  filter(year >= 1900)
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y = sum_prop, color= sex)) + geom_density()

glimpse(x)


```
